title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Curriculum for Cultivating Biochemistry-Based Engineering Talent

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics, general biology, and fundamental chemistry concepts
context.additional_context: Cultivate biochemistry talent with engineering application skills by emphasizing real-world problem-solving through PBL (Problem-Based Learning).

learning_goals: Students can systematically analyze real-world engineering problems (e.g., enzyme-utilized process design) by applying biochemical principles
Learners perform science and technology problem-solving tasks provided by the LMS platform with a target success rate of over 80%
Participants can propose over ten creative alternatives in teamwork-based problem-solving processes through a peer assessment system
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
